meta.job_title: Senior Software Development Engineer in Test

duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop automation/performance solutions to test applications across Web/Windows/API/Services platforms and framing efficient data comparison methods.
Lead the test automation/performance strategy and ensure best practices, refactoring and extending test automation/performance frameworks and suites as necessary.
Act as a test lead, planning the work of other testing staff and assigning tasks to meet project deadlines.
Participate in internal/cross-team meetings, project scoping, functional reviews, test specifications, and technical reviews for assigned projects in an Agile environment.
Provide guidance and assistance to project staff, including reviewing and approving work, and ensuring standard methodologies are followed.
Gather quality assurance data and metrics to provide insights and conclusions, estimate and perform risk analysis for quality delivery.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or higher qualification in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent is preferred
